summary: Braunau am Inn is a town in the Innviertel region of Upper Austria , the north-western state of Austria.
full_text: Braunau am Inn   is a town in the Austrian state of Upper Austria, the capital of Braunau am Inn District. Located on the border with Germany, it is the largest town in the Upper Austrian Innviertel region. Braunau is known for being the birthplace of Adolf Hitler.
title: Braunau am Inn
